author: remm
msg: - Path /. wasn't normalized properly (but /./ was). It's treated as a special case.

author: remm
msg: - Don't set an initial context factory.

author: remm
msg: - Fix thread safety problems with the WebDAV servlet. The problem was
that the JAXP document builder was not thread safe. Now, a new instance
will be created on each request.
The problem was reported and fixed by Juergen Pill in Slide, but I forgot to
backport the fix (sorry ...), and it was reported again by Max du Prel <mduprel at leveld.de>

author: remm
msg: - Update to the new version of the Xerces Base64 encoder/decoder.
The old one had problems encoding binary content.
